There are Linux binaries available at the distribution site:
http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/pub/ <http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/pub/>
, though I can't currently reach the site. I didn't have any problems with
the compile on Redhat, so I would be curious to know what version you are
trying to compile and what the errors are.


--thomas
